name: Programming-music
body:
### Welcome to Programming Music

The LSU Experimental Music & Digital Media program is proud to share this content for learning how to Program for making music. 

More info coming soon.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2015, Dr. Jesse Allison (@jesseallison), Danny Holmes, Andrew Pfalz, Zak Berkowitz, Will Conlin, and Nick Hwang created this curriculum to teach an EMDM Academy 

### Contact EMDM Academy
For more information, head to [EMDM Academy](http://emdmacademy.music.lsu.edu) to see what other things we have to offer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
